PAN Temui Pimpinan Parpol Bahas UU Kontroversial dan Pemilu 2024
05 Nov 2019, 05:57 by Antara, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ketua Umum DPP PAN Zulkifli Hasan mengaku akan menemui pimpinan partai politik antara lain PDI Perjuangan, Partai NasDem, dan Partai Golkar, untuk menyamakan persepsi mengenai beberapa rancangan undang-undang (RUU) kontroversial dan persiapan Pemilu 2024. "Pertemuan dengan partai-partai itu kan biasa ya. Ini juga lagi diatur untuk membahas RKUHP dan RUU Pertanahan yang menuai pro-kontra," kata Zulkifli Hasan di Kompleks Parlemen, Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019. Rabu malam, Zulkifli diundang Golkar.
Menurut dia Rancangan Kitab Undang-undang Hukum Pidana dan RUU Pertanahan menuai pro-kontra terhadap DPR periode 2014-2019. Partai politik harus menyamakan persepsi sehingga dibutuhkan silaturahmi.Pertemuan PAN dengan para pimpinan parpol untuk silaturahmi antar-partai, dan masing-masing sudah mulai "melihat" terkait agenda politik di 2024.
"(Agenda politik) 2024 kan sebentar lagi sampai, nanti tidak terasa dan banyak yang akan dibicarakan seperti RUU." Pertemuan politik untuk jangka pendeknya adalah menghadapi Pilkada 2020, karena sebenarnya untuk kontestasi Pilkada, di level sekretaris jenderal masing-masing partai sudah sering dilakukan pertemuan.
Zulkifli mengatakan, PAN tidak bisa mengusung pasangan calon kepala daerah sendirian, namun harus mengajak partai lain berkoalisi sehingga tiga-empat partai bergabung. "Bagaimana dalam satu daerah itu PAN bisa kerjasama dengan Golkar, PDIP, dan NasDem.”
Pertemuan-pertemuan dengan partai-partai lain itu akan intens karena PAN tak bisa sendirian mengusung calon kepala daerah di satu provinsi. “Harus mengajak partai lain dan itu biasanya tiga partai empat partai."

PAN Meets Leaders of Political Parties Discussing the 2024 Controversial and Election Law
05 Nov 2019, 05:57 by Antara, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - DPP PAN Chairperson Zulkifli Hasan said he would meet with political party leaders including PDI Perjuangan, NasDem Party, and Golkar Party, to equalize perceptions about some controversial bill designs and preparations for the 2024 Election. " "It is also regulated to discuss the RKUHP and the Land Bill which has pros and cons," said Zulkifli Hasan at the Parliament Complex, Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019. Wednesday night, Zulkifli was invited by Golkar.
According to him the Draft Book of the Criminal Law and the Land Bill reaped pros and cons against the DPR for the 2014-2019 period. Political parties must synchronize perceptions so that hospitality is needed. PAN meetings with political party leaders for inter-party friendship, and each has begun to "look" related to the political agenda in 2024.
"(Political agenda) 2024 will arrive soon, it will not be felt and much will be discussed as a bill." The political meeting for the short term is to face the 2020 elections, because actually for the election contestation, at the level of the secretary general of each party, meetings are often held.
Zulkifli said, PAN could not carry the regional head candidate pairs alone, but had to invite other parties to form a coalition so that three or four parties joined. "How can PAN work together with Golkar, PDIP, and NasDem in one region?"
Meetings with other parties will be intense because PAN cannot alone carry out regional head candidates in one province. "We have to invite other parties and that is usually three parties with four parties."
